verses.name: Luke 22:25
verses.text: And he said unto them, The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors.

verses.name: Luke 22:26
verses.text: But ye shall not be so: but he that is greatest among you, let him be as the younger; and he that is chief, as he that doth serve.

verses.name: Luke 22:27
verses.text: For whether is greater, he that sitteth at meat, or he that serveth? is not he that sitteth at meat? but I am among you as he that serveth.

verses.name: Luke 22:28
verses.text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations.
